Predecessor dataclass

Used to describe the predecessor to a node in a path.

class predecessor.Predecessor(pos, part_to_successor, part_to_predecessor, direction, state_grid=None, part_stock=<factory>, path=<factory>)

Bases: object

Dataclass that contains information about the predecessor of a node

pos

Node position of the predecessor.

Type: Pos

part_to_successor

Part used at predecessor_node to get to successor.

Type: int

part_to_predecessor

Part used at predecessor_node to get to successor.

Type: int

direction

Direction the predecessor is facing.

Type: Pos

state_grid

State grid snapshot when predecessor was created.

Type: StateGrid

part_stock

Snapshot of the part stock when predecessor was created.

Type: PartStock

path

Snapshot of path to predecessor

Type: Path
